title: The Colors of the Devil 1997 (Italian Thriller film) Giles Blunt, Alain Jessua, Roger Curel

sources.title: The Colors of the Devil 1997 (Italian Thriller film) Giles Blunt, Alain Jessua, Roger Curel
sources.description:
A young talented painter dreams of glory. A man promises it in exchange for his talent and his soul.

Original title: Les couleurs du diable (1997)
Watch the uncensored Members Only version: https://youtu.be/4U05jMU51dk

Director: Alain Jessua
Writers: Giles Blunt, Alain Jessua, Roger Curel
Stars: Ruggero Raimondi, Wadeck Stanczak, Isabelle Pasco, Bettina Giovannini
Genres: European Cinema, Giallo, Drama, Thriller

This film is available with Italian audio, and subtitles in many languages.
